dcmDigestAlgorithm.title: Digest Algorithm
dcmDigestAlgorithm.description: Algorithm for generation of check sums: 'MD5' or 'SHA-1'

dcmInstanceAvailability.title: Instance Availability
dcmInstanceAvailability.description: Instance Availability: ONLINE, NEARLINE or OFFLINE

dcmReadOnly.title: Read Only
dcmReadOnly.description: Indicates if a Storage System is read only

storageThreshold.title: Storage Threshold
storageThreshold.description: Minimal Usable Space on Storage System. If the usable space fall below that value the Storage System will be removed from the list of configured Storage Systems of the Network AE requesting that Storage System in bytes

deleterThreshold.title: Deleter Threshold
deleterThreshold.description: Minimal Usable Space on Storage System to trigger deletion. If present, studies are deleted from the Storage System, if the usable space fall below that value

dcmExternalRetrieveAET.title: External Retrieve AET
dcmExternalRetrieveAET.description: Constrain deletion of Studies, if usable space falls below the configured threshold, to Studies which objects are retrievable using this AE from an external C-MOVE SCP.

dcmExportStorageID.title: Export Storage ID
dcmExportStorageID.description: Constrain deletion of Studies, if usable space falls below the configured threshold, to Studies which objects are also accessible from the specified other storage.

dcmRetrieveCacheStorageID.title: Retrieve Cache Storage ID
dcmRetrieveCacheStorageID.description: Specifies another Storage to which objects are copied in parallel on retrieve to increase the performance on accessing storage systems which provides more bandwidth using multiple connections in parallel.

dcmStorageClusterID.title: Storage Cluster ID
dcmStorageClusterID.description: Specifies storage cluster to which the storage system belongs.

dcmRetrieveCacheMaxParallel.title: Retrieve Cache Max Parallel
dcmRetrieveCacheMaxParallel.description: Maximal number of parallel copies to cache storage on retrieve.

dicomAETitle.title: AE Title
dicomAETitle.description: AE Title associated with the Storage System

usableSpace.title: Usable Space
usableSpace.description: Usable Space left on Storage System in bytes

totalSpace.title: Total Space
totalSpace.description: Total Space on Storage System in bytes
